ValidationRule.description: To prevent ACV entries in the final month of a contract with a mid-month Start Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Membership_Contract__r.RecordTypeId = "0121O000001CFny" && MONTH( Date__c ) = MONTH ( Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c ) && YEAR( Date__c ) = YEAR( Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c ) && DAY(Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c) <> IF(Month(Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c)=12, 31, DAY(DATE(YEAR(Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c),MONTH(Membership_Contract__r.End_Date__c)+1,1) - 1)) && $User.Id <> '00530000003A32O' /*Paul Harney*/ && $User.Id <> '005a0000007Wamb' /*Jeff Fahndrich*/ && $User.Id <> '00530000001YEiF' /*Jennifer Valdez*/ && $User.Id <> '0055Y00000I0fox' /*Jennifer Brenner*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An ACV entry cannot be created for a partial end month. Please contact salesforce@erepublic.com if you need assistance.
